name: Space Battle VR
description: Space Battle VR is an action shooter set in space. It supports VR controllers to give you a real feel how it is to be a spaceship pilot. You can truly feel the cosmos with this game. Jump into an awesome adventure, help mankind, win a war, bring freedom and happiness to the universe. People need you!
minimum_requirements: OS: 32/64-bit Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Standard Additional Notes: VR support is required
recommended_requirements: OS: 32/64-bit Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Standard Additional Notes: VR support is required
